projects.title: Employee Product Assignment System Backend
projects.description: The Employee Product Assignment System is a web application designed to manage the assignment of demo products to employees within an organization.

projects.title: Vehicle Transfer Module
projects.description: A Vehicle owner can manages to transfer a vehicle from one driver to another while keeping a record of all transfers

projects.title: Online Flight Booking
projects.description: A website to book flight, hold fare, cancel booking, auto cancel holing fare and fare increase implemented. alert on seat availability.

projects.title: Book Management System
projects.description: Develop a RESTful API for managing a collection of books. The API should allow users to perform CRUD operations on books and support user authentication.
